review:
Got referred here with strong push and it was all worth.

Dental implants and some rehab were essential for me and literally I froze everytimre I went fr treatment but here with Dr Nitin, assurance was such that I got convinced myself to take a go ahead and bang it was a smooth journey


Now I m back smiling and it's nice to look this way. 
Thanks a ton Dr Nitin

Excellent work ethics and care by Dr Nitin.
Was there for few Root canals and cappings. 
The treatment was absolutely painless and trustworthy regime was followed. 

I recommend him to those looking for a quality work and specialised care.

Dr nitin is an excellent dentist and thorough professional.
He has a remarkable ability to inspire confidence in his patients because of his thorough and methodical approach. 
Have been visiting him for  many years now and each visit is just so easy and experience is just a bliss with expert hands of Dr Nitin.

Clinic is very well managed and staff is cooperative. 

Highly recommended
